docs.lead_paragraph: After a decade of near-death experiences, the Internet music service is attracting attention from investment bankers who think it could go public.

headline.seo: How Pandora Avoided the Junkyard, and Found Success
headline.main: How Pandora Slipped Past the Junkyard
headline.print_headline: How Pandora Slipped Past The Junkyard

docs.snippet: After a decade of near-death experiences, the Internet music service is attracting attention from investment bankers who think it could go public.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- This really is the home stretch in the health care debate. But after 199 laps around the racetrack, it is hard not to feel dizzy, and even a little lost. So here is a handy road map for the next three weeks -- a sort of GPS guide to the health care finish line.

headline.main: A Handy Road Map For the Final Weeks
headline.kicker: PRESCRIPTIONS MAKING SENSE OF THE HEALTH CARE DEBATE

docs.abstract: Prescriptions article notes that health care debate is in home stretch and offers guide to finish line; photo (M)
